data.title: Themed Cruises – On Board Special Events
data.meta_description: Sail on one of our exclusive themed cruises with special guests, fun activities and unique experiences. Learn more about our themed cruises and onboard special events.
data.meta_site_name: Cruises – Cruise Vacations – Find Best Cruises
data.text:
Princess Cruises Celebrations Ambassador Jill Whelan (aka Vicki Stubing) will join fellow Love Boat cast members including Bernie Kopell (Doc), Fred Grandy (Gopher), and Ted Lange (Isaac). Ezra Freeman, the bartender from the recently aired The Real Love Boat on CBS reality dating series, will join the cast, along with other surprise guests to be announced.

Highly anticipated Love Boat-themed activities, include:

Sailaway party introducing the cast

Meet-and-greet photo and signing opportunities

The Love Boat-inspired guest activities with prizes

Cocktail demonstration hosted by Ezra Freeman and Ted Lange – practice the finger point!

Symbolic renewal of vows ceremony, officiated by the cast, with commemorative certificate

Cast Q&As sharing favorite memories of the show and stories of their careers

The Love Boat episodes airing on Movies Under the Stars® and in staterooms

The Love Boat trivia with the Cruise Director

The Love Boat inspired menus and specialty cocktails

Themed décor, photo backdrops and merchandise

Fans can set a course for adventure, Love and laughter aboard Regal Princess.

Love fine wine, heavenly cuisine and dreamy destinations? Put all those passions together for one spectacular voyage celebrating California’s wines and the flavors of the Pacific Northwest. Indulge in exclusive experiences like our Winemakers Dinners, featuring perfectly paired courses — each wine curated to complement the forthcoming culinary delights. These dinners are not available on most cruises, so take advantage of them on this voyage! You’ll also enjoy two shore excursions in San Francisco, including the unique opportunity to explore vineyards, meet world-renowned winemakers and taste your next favorite wines. Legendary wineries include Caymus Wines, Silver Oak Cellars, Chamisal Vineyards and Ancient Peaks Winery. Get tips from the experts as you deepen your wine knowledge. Don’t miss this palate-pleasing culinary adventure that you can only experience with Princess. And with all the onboard amenities, entertainment and legendary service on your ship, you’ll get the best of all worlds. It’s truly a one-of-a-kind opportunity for the foodie who loves to cruise. Plus, you’ll be sailing the gorgeous coastline with all its sweeping vistas and iconic landmarks when the West Coast weather is at its absolute best.

As our Official Magic Partner, The Magic Castle™ and Princess Cruises have teamed up again for another adventure highlighting Spellbound, the new extraordinary magic-themed experience debuting on Sun Princess®. Setting sail on a round-trip voyage from Fort Lauderdale Nov. 9-16, 2024, this themed cruise will feature popular Western Caribbean ports of call including Roatan, Belize and Cozumel.

Exclusive to Sun Princess and set to debut early next year, Spellbound is a one-of-a-kind venue nestled behind a nondescript door that blends the captivating world of magic with the art of mixology to create an extraordinary Victorian-inspired bar experience. In addition to the enchantment of Spellbound, the seven-day journey provides participants an opportunity to lift the veil of The Magic Castle™ with custom-curated events and activities, including:

Performances by top magicians throughout the ship

Uniquely tailored magic lectures

Curios and artifacts from magic’s rich history on display

Magic-filled cocktail parties, dinners and brunches

A specially curated historical presentation with the founding family of the Magic Castle™ to hear firsthand how this establishment came to be and what continues to make it so beloved today

Featuring the Good Food Show team and a cast of very special guests, you can enjoy celebrity cookery demonstrations, tutored tastings, cocktail classes and hands on workshops onboard Sky Princess. See the pages of the nation’s favourite foodie magazine and website come to life as you dine on Good Food classics, meet your culinary heroes, take part in live Q&A sessions and get up close and personal in private meet & greet dining experiences and book signings onboard.

Four celebrated TV personalities - John Torode, Lisa Faulkner, Gennaro Contaldo and Rachel Allen - will be the culinary stars line-up for this cruise. Husband and wife duo John and Lisa, both of MasterChef fame and Gennaro, known as the man who taught Jamie Oliver the ways of Italian Cuisine, are the first of an esteemed line-up of foodies that have signed on to bring flare and flavour to the sea. Rachel Allen, renowned Irish chef, cookbook author, and teacher at the prestigious Ballymaloe Cookery School is returning onboard to share her cooking expertise and love for baking.

Sky Princess will escort you to dream destinations on an unforgettable journey from Southampton. Go pintxos bar hopping in Bilbão, or pastel de nata tasting in Lisbon. Set sail on the iconic Sky Princess where a personalised MedallionClass experience and service comes as standard, and where food anchors every Princess journey.
